channel.title: Archery (Mini Game) on Multi Games Hoard
channel.description: Recent content in Archery (Mini Game) on Multi Games Hoard

item.title: Shortcuts of Archery
item.description:
%title%

  • Spacebar: Press and hold to draw the Bow, and release to fire.
    • On Android, double tap on the screen to draw the Bow. Repeat the process to fire.
  • Escape: Exit the game.
    • On Android, click back button.
